author: kevinbogner
content: This is still in a super early stage. Data is from blockprint but manually requested. Does anyone know where I get reliable data on block proposals from?

author: potuz
content: this is tracking number of proposals per epoch?

author: potuz
content: One thing I would be personally interested in would be fees earned split by client if you manage to filter Mev Boost ones. I suspect that LightHouse's approach to their calling FCU makes it so that Prysm has less time to produce a block and thus gets a smaller attestation pool. I need to look into this, would love to get data on this though

author: kevinbogner
content:
Ah yes it is. I misunderstood it at first. "Return the number of blocks proposed by each client in the requested epochs." https://github.com/sigp/blockprint/blob/main/docs/api.md

I need to implement the blockprint API and then look into what makes sense to add additional.

author: potuz
content: yeah, more than blocks produced I'm interested in attestation data by client. I presume that Michael already aggregates block production by client in their reports about client diversity

author: kevinbogner
content: Yeah, he does. I definitely need some additional vectors to add some value.
